::Ramulus/Striker::

Ramulus jumps out of the way of the flame in time to see Ursa Major catch the 
disk in front of him.

"Thanks. There's nothing we can do for now, we'll rescue her later. Let's get 
out of here!" He says, firing at Pyro.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Striker runs up to Ramhorn. Seeing some of the maximals retreat, he grabs 
Ramhorn in his mouth, running off toward the Ark.
